title: Vaibhavam Floral Kundan and Emerald Nakshi Haar
features: A captivating floral design featuring exquisite Kundan (Polki) diamonds arranged delicately around a central ruby, accented by strategically placed emeralds. The necklace boasts meticulous Nakshi work throughout the floral motifs, giving the gold an antique, textured finish. This classic design uses floral motifs that have been popular for decades in South India.
description: This Haar is a stunning fusion of traditional South Indian craftsmanship and timeless elegance. The use of uncut Kundan diamonds, vibrant emeralds, and deep red rubies creates a mesmerizing sparkle. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the antique feel, adding to its charm. The Nakshi work exemplifies the skill of our artisans, making this piece a heirloom-quality investment. Its floral design is considered auspicious and brings prosperity.
